title: Hardcore Henry 2016 HD-TS x264 AC3 Exclusive-CPG
description:
[center]
[img]http://ultraimg.com/images/HardcoreHenryPoster.jpg[/img]
 
[title]Hardcore Henry 2016 HD-TS x264 AC3 Exclusive-CPG[/title]
 
A first-person action film from the eyes of Henry, who's resurrected from death with no memory. He must discover his identity and save his wife from a warlord with a plan to bio-engineer soldiers.
  
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3072482/
 
[info]
[B][I]First of All kisses to tamabin[/B][/I]
 
[b]Movie[/b]
its a first person shooter like call of duty etc... so you can expect lot of camera movements in a way it was shot, brutual fight scenes and some uncomfortable scenes, lot of blood and shit is there.. fully hardcore and unrated.
 
[b]Encode[/b]
source was fantastic, had usual issue nothing like we have'nt fixed it before, its a bit zommed in, its for reason though! very few people actually knew that.
clean the source, work on colors a bit, added slight sharp, crop and resize etc...
it has some movements in middle for few mins nothing bad though, rest is steady but henry is not steady lol.. perspective is a bit off which i intentially did not touch, its already zoomed in so no need to cut more video.
perspective fix cause less picture in end result.
then synced Exclusive-Thx Th0ravenger Audio to my finish video lip to lip sync, audio required some work so did that.
it has english subs for foreign parts but few subs are cropped half due to the way it was captured another reason there is no need to touch perspective and some are easily readable.
 
i don't think we will see another version of this even if we did, it wont be equal to this quality.  sample included must check it first.
 
[info]
Video: AVC 2100kbps HQ-2Pass
Resolution: 720x400 30fps
Audio: AC3 2.0 Digital line audio
Subtitles: English for foreign parts
Language: English
Encoder: CPG
Sample: included
